business.subject: Thank You for Your Business
business.content:

Thank you for your recent purchase. We appreciate your business and hope you are satisfied with your order.

Best regards,
{signature}

business.subject: Your Invoice for {item}
business.content:

Sincerely,
{signature}

Best regards,
